Patrem omnipotentem: vīsibilium omnium et invīsibilium. ^ Maker of Heaven and earth
^ I believe in one God: and of all things visible and invisible.

Crēdō in ūnum Deum: Et in ūnum Dominum Jēsum Christum
^ I believe in one God: ^ And in one Lord Jesus Christ

Crēdō in ūnum Deum: et ex Patre nātum ante omnia saecula; ^ begotten of the Father before all ages;

^ I believe in one God: per quem omnia facta sunt. ^ begotten not made
the Father Almighty: of one essence with the Father
column5: by whom all things were made.

Crēdō in ūnum Deum: Quī propter nōs hominēs et propter nostram salūtem dēscendit dē caelīs
Patrem omnipotentem: ^ Who for us men and for our salvation came down from the heavens

Crēdō in ūnum Deum: et incarnātus est dē Spīritū Sanctō ex Mariā Virgine
Patrem omnipotentem: et homō factus est. ^ and was incarnate of the Holy Spirit and the Virgin Mary

Crēdō in ūnum Deum: Crucifixus etiam prō nōbīs sub Pontiō Pīlātō
^ I believe in one God: ^ He was crucified for us under Pontius Pilate
^ and arose again on the third day according to the Scriptures

Patrem omnipotentem: sedet ad dexteram Patris. ^ and ascended into the heavens
^ I believe in one God: and sitteth at the right hand of the Father.

Crēdō in ūnum Deum: Et iterum ventūrus est cum glōriā
^ I believe in one God: cujus regnī nōn erit fīnis. ^ And he shall come again with glory
the Father Almighty: to judge both the living and the dead
column5: whose kingdom shall have no end.

^ I believe in one God: quī ex Patre procēdit. ^ And in the Holy Spirit
the Father Almighty: the Lord and giver of life

Crēdō in ūnum Deum: Quī cum Patre et Fīliō simul adōrātur et conglōrificātur; quī locūtus est per profētās. ^ Who with the Father and the Son together is worshipped and glorified; who spake by the prophets.

the Father Almighty: et apostolicam Ecclēsiam. ^ And in one

Crēdō in ūnum Deum: Confiteor ūnum baptisma in remissiōnem peccātōrum. ^ I confess one Baptism for the remission of sins.

Patrem omnipotentem: et vītam ventūrī saeculī. Āmen. ^ I look for the resurrection of the dead
